mapper.select: select * from v_pimcontract t1 where pimcontractid=#{id}
select * from v_pimcontract t1 where pimcontractid=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`ACTION`, t1.`CONTRACTNUM`, t1.`CONTRACTSIGNORGID`, t51.`CONTRACTSIGNORGNAME`, t1.`CONTRACTTYPE`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`CZ`, t11.`DBDWSJ`, t1.`DEMO`, ROUND(months_between(sysdate,t11.`DBDWSJ`)/12) AS `DURATION`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`|| ' '||t11.`YGBH` AS `EMPLOYEEANDNO`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`HTBH`, t1.`HTLX`, case when t1.`HTZT`='20' or t1.`HTZT`='30' then trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate) else null end AS `HTSYTS`, case when case when t1.`HTZT`='20' or t1.`HTZT`='30' then trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate) else null end<60 then 20 else 10 END AS `HTSYTS_COLOR`, t1.`HTZT`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `HTZZDZS`, t1.`ISFIRSTSIGN`, t1.`ISYEMP`, t1.`JOBCONTENT`, t1.`JSRQ`, t1.`LEGALORG`, t41.`LEVELCODE`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t41.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMSIGNORGID`, t31.`ORMSIGNORGNAME`, t11.`ORMORGID` AS `PERSONORGID`, t61.`ZZDZS` AS `PERSONORGNAME`, t1.`PIMCONTRACTID`, t1.`PIMCONTRACTNAME`, t1.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYID`, t21.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`QSRQ`, case when t1.`HTLX`='20' then t21.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME` else t31.`ORMSIGNORGNAME` end AS `SIGNINGUNIT`, t1.`SSLWPQGS`, t1.`SYDQSJ`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`YGBH`, t11.`YGZT`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t61.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_PIMCONTRACT` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMLABOURCAMPANY t21 ON t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID = t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID LEFT JOIN T_ORMSIGNORG t31 ON t1.ORMSIGNORGID = t31.ORMSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_CONTRACTSIGNORG t51 ON t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID = t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t61 ON t11.ORMORGID = t61.ORGID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.ACTION, t1.CONTRACTNUM, t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID, t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGNAME, t1.CONTRACTTYPE, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.CZ, t11.DBDWSJ, t1.DEMO, ROUND(months_between(sysdate,t11.DBDWSJ)/12) AS DURATION, t11.PIMPERSONNAME|| ' '||t11.YGBH AS EMPLOYEEANDNO, t1.ENABLE, t1.HTBH, t1.HTLX, case when t1.HTZT='20' or t1.HTZT='30' then trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate) else null end AS HTSYTS, case when case when t1.HTZT='20' or t1.HTZT='30' then trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate) else null end<60 then 20 else 10 END AS HTSYTS_COLOR, t1.HTZT, t41.ZZDZS AS HTZZDZS, t1.ISFIRSTSIGN, t1.ISYEMP, t1.JOBCONTENT, t1.JSRQ, t1.LEGALORG, t41.LEVELCODE, t1.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t11.ORMORGSECTORID AS ORGSECTORID, t1.ORMORGID, t41.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME, t11.ORMORGSECTORID, t1.ORMSIGNORGID, t31.ORMSIGNORGNAME, t11.ORMORGID AS PERSONORGID, t61.ZZDZS AS PERSONORGNAME, t1.PIMCONTRACTID, t1.PIMCONTRACTNAME, t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID, t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.QSRQ, case when t1.HTLX='20' then t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME else t31.ORMSIGNORGNAME end AS SIGNINGUNIT, t1.SSLWPQGS, t1.SYDQSJ, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t11.YGBH, t11.YGZT, case when t11.YGZT in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS ZGCODE, t61.ZZDZS FROM T_PIMCONTRACT t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMLABOURCAMPANY t21 ON t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID = t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID LEFT JOIN T_ORMSIGNORG t31 ON t1.ORMSIGNORGID = t31.ORMSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_CONTRACTSIGNORG t51 ON t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID = t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t61 ON t11.ORMORGID = t61.ORGID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1

SELECT t1.`ACTION`, t1.`CONTRACTNUM`, t1.`CONTRACTSIGNORGID`, t51.`CONTRACTSIGNORGNAME`, t1.`CONTRACTTYPE`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`CZ`, t11.`DBDWSJ`, t1.`DEMO`, ROUND(months_between(sysdate,t11.`DBDWSJ`)/12) AS `DURATION`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`|| ' '||t11.`YGBH` AS `EMPLOYEEANDNO`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`HTBH`, t1.`HTLX`, case when t1.`HTZT`='20' or t1.`HTZT`='30' then trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate) else null end AS `HTSYTS`, case when case when t1.`HTZT`='20' or t1.`HTZT`='30' then trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate) else null end<60 then 20 else 10 END AS `HTSYTS_COLOR`, t1.`HTZT`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `HTZZDZS`, t1.`ISFIRSTSIGN`, t1.`ISYEMP`, t1.`JOBCONTENT`, t1.`JSRQ`, t1.`LEGALORG`, t41.`LEVELCODE`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t41.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMSIGNORGID`, t31.`ORMSIGNORGNAME`, t11.`ORMORGID` AS `PERSONORGID`, t61.`ZZDZS` AS `PERSONORGNAME`, t1.`PIMCONTRACTID`, t1.`PIMCONTRACTNAME`, t1.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYID`, t21.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`QSRQ`, case when t1.`HTLX`='20' then t21.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME` else t31.`ORMSIGNORGNAME` end AS `SIGNINGUNIT`, t1.`SSLWPQGS`, t1.`SYDQSJ`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`YGBH`, t11.`YGZT`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t61.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_PIMCONTRACT` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMLABOURCAMPANY t21 ON t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID = t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID LEFT JOIN T_ORMSIGNORG t31 ON t1.ORMSIGNORGID = t31.ORMSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_CONTRACTSIGNORG t51 ON t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID = t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t61 ON t11.ORMORGID = t61.ORGID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`PIMPERSONID` = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID} )

SELECT t1.ACTION, t1.CONTRACTNUM, t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID, t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGNAME, t1.CONTRACTTYPE, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.CZ, t11.DBDWSJ, t1.DEMO, ROUND(months_between(sysdate,t11.DBDWSJ)/12) AS DURATION, t11.PIMPERSONNAME|| ' '||t11.YGBH AS EMPLOYEEANDNO, t1.ENABLE, t1.HTBH, t1.HTLX, case when t1.HTZT='20' or t1.HTZT='30' then trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate) else null end AS HTSYTS, case when case when t1.HTZT='20' or t1.HTZT='30' then trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate) else null end<60 then 20 else 10 END AS HTSYTS_COLOR, t1.HTZT, t41.ZZDZS AS HTZZDZS, t1.ISFIRSTSIGN, t1.ISYEMP, t1.JOBCONTENT, t1.JSRQ, t1.LEGALORG, t41.LEVELCODE, t1.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t11.ORMORGSECTORID AS ORGSECTORID, t1.ORMORGID, t41.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME, t11.ORMORGSECTORID, t1.ORMSIGNORGID, t31.ORMSIGNORGNAME, t11.ORMORGID AS PERSONORGID, t61.ZZDZS AS PERSONORGNAME, t1.PIMCONTRACTID, t1.PIMCONTRACTNAME, t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID, t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.QSRQ, case when t1.HTLX='20' then t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME else t31.ORMSIGNORGNAME end AS SIGNINGUNIT, t1.SSLWPQGS, t1.SYDQSJ, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t11.YGBH, t11.YGZT, case when t11.YGZT in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS ZGCODE, t61.ZZDZS FROM T_PIMCONTRACT t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMLABOURCAMPANY t21 ON t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID = t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID LEFT JOIN T_ORMSIGNORG t31 ON t1.ORMSIGNORGID = t31.ORMSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_CONTRACTSIGNORG t51 ON t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID = t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t61 ON t11.ORMORGID = t61.ORGID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.PIMPERSONID = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID} )

SELECT t1.`ACTION`, t1.`CONTRACTNUM`, t1.`CONTRACTSIGNORGID`, t51.`CONTRACTSIGNORGNAME`, t1.`CONTRACTTYPE`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`CZ`, t11.`DBDWSJ`, t1.`DEMO`, ROUND(months_between(sysdate,t11.`DBDWSJ`)/12) AS `DURATION`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`|| ' '||t11.`YGBH` AS `EMPLOYEEANDNO`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`HTBH`, t1.`HTLX`, case when t1.`HTZT`='20' or t1.`HTZT`='30' then trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate) else null end AS `HTSYTS`, case when case when t1.`HTZT`='20' or t1.`HTZT`='30' then trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate) else null end<60 then 20 else 10 END AS `HTSYTS_COLOR`, t1.`HTZT`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `HTZZDZS`, t1.`ISFIRSTSIGN`, t1.`ISYEMP`, t1.`JOBCONTENT`, t1.`JSRQ`, t1.`LEGALORG`, t41.`LEVELCODE`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t41.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMSIGNORGID`, t31.`ORMSIGNORGNAME`, t11.`ORMORGID` AS `PERSONORGID`, t61.`ZZDZS` AS `PERSONORGNAME`, t1.`PIMCONTRACTID`, t1.`PIMCONTRACTNAME`, t1.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYID`, t21.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`QSRQ`, case when t1.`HTLX`='20' then t21.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME` else t31.`ORMSIGNORGNAME` end AS `SIGNINGUNIT`, t1.`SSLWPQGS`, t1.`SYDQSJ`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`YGBH`, t11.`YGZT`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t61.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_PIMCONTRACT` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMLABOURCAMPANY t21 ON t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID = t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID LEFT JOIN T_ORMSIGNORG t31 ON t1.ORMSIGNORGID = t31.ORMSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_CONTRACTSIGNORG t51 ON t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID = t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t61 ON t11.ORMORGID = t61.ORGID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`HTLX` = '10' )

SELECT t1.ACTION, t1.CONTRACTNUM, t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID, t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGNAME, t1.CONTRACTTYPE, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.CZ, t11.DBDWSJ, t1.DEMO, ROUND(months_between(sysdate,t11.DBDWSJ)/12) AS DURATION, t11.PIMPERSONNAME|| ' '||t11.YGBH AS EMPLOYEEANDNO, t1.ENABLE, t1.HTBH, t1.HTLX, case when t1.HTZT='20' or t1.HTZT='30' then trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate) else null end AS HTSYTS, case when case when t1.HTZT='20' or t1.HTZT='30' then trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate) else null end<60 then 20 else 10 END AS HTSYTS_COLOR, t1.HTZT, t41.ZZDZS AS HTZZDZS, t1.ISFIRSTSIGN, t1.ISYEMP, t1.JOBCONTENT, t1.JSRQ, t1.LEGALORG, t41.LEVELCODE, t1.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t11.ORMORGSECTORID AS ORGSECTORID, t1.ORMORGID, t41.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME, t11.ORMORGSECTORID, t1.ORMSIGNORGID, t31.ORMSIGNORGNAME, t11.ORMORGID AS PERSONORGID, t61.ZZDZS AS PERSONORGNAME, t1.PIMCONTRACTID, t1.PIMCONTRACTNAME, t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID, t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.QSRQ, case when t1.HTLX='20' then t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME else t31.ORMSIGNORGNAME end AS SIGNINGUNIT, t1.SSLWPQGS, t1.SYDQSJ, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t11.YGBH, t11.YGZT, case when t11.YGZT in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS ZGCODE, t61.ZZDZS FROM T_PIMCONTRACT t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMLABOURCAMPANY t21 ON t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID = t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID LEFT JOIN T_ORMSIGNORG t31 ON t1.ORMSIGNORGID = t31.ORMSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_CONTRACTSIGNORG t51 ON t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID = t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t61 ON t11.ORMORGID = t61.ORGID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.HTLX = '10' )

SELECT t1.`ACTION`, t1.`CONTRACTNUM`, t1.`CONTRACTSIGNORGID`, t51.`CONTRACTSIGNORGNAME`, t1.`CONTRACTTYPE`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`CZ`, t11.`DBDWSJ`, t1.`DEMO`, ROUND(months_between(sysdate,t11.`DBDWSJ`)/12) AS `DURATION`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`|| ' '||t11.`YGBH` AS `EMPLOYEEANDNO`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`HTBH`, t1.`HTLX`, case when t1.`HTZT`='20' or t1.`HTZT`='30' then trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate) else null end AS `HTSYTS`, case when case when t1.`HTZT`='20' or t1.`HTZT`='30' then trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate) else null end<60 then 20 else 10 END AS `HTSYTS_COLOR`, t1.`HTZT`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `HTZZDZS`, t1.`ISFIRSTSIGN`, t1.`ISYEMP`, t1.`JOBCONTENT`, t1.`JSRQ`, t1.`LEGALORG`, t41.`LEVELCODE`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t41.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMSIGNORGID`, t31.`ORMSIGNORGNAME`, t11.`ORMORGID` AS `PERSONORGID`, t61.`ZZDZS` AS `PERSONORGNAME`, t1.`PIMCONTRACTID`, t1.`PIMCONTRACTNAME`, t1.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYID`, t21.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`QSRQ`, case when t1.`HTLX`='20' then t21.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME` else t31.`ORMSIGNORGNAME` end AS `SIGNINGUNIT`, t1.`SSLWPQGS`, t1.`SYDQSJ`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`YGBH`, t11.`YGZT`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t61.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_PIMCONTRACT` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMLABOURCAMPANY t21 ON t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID = t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID LEFT JOIN T_ORMSIGNORG t31 ON t1.ORMSIGNORGID = t31.ORMSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_CONTRACTSIGNORG t51 ON t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID = t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t61 ON t11.ORMORGID = t61.ORGID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`HTLX` = '20' AND ( t1.`HTZT` = '20' OR t1.`HTZT` = '30' ) )

SELECT t1.ACTION, t1.CONTRACTNUM, t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID, t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGNAME, t1.CONTRACTTYPE, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.CZ, t11.DBDWSJ, t1.DEMO, ROUND(months_between(sysdate,t11.DBDWSJ)/12) AS DURATION, t11.PIMPERSONNAME|| ' '||t11.YGBH AS EMPLOYEEANDNO, t1.ENABLE, t1.HTBH, t1.HTLX, case when t1.HTZT='20' or t1.HTZT='30' then trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate) else null end AS HTSYTS, case when case when t1.HTZT='20' or t1.HTZT='30' then trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate) else null end<60 then 20 else 10 END AS HTSYTS_COLOR, t1.HTZT, t41.ZZDZS AS HTZZDZS, t1.ISFIRSTSIGN, t1.ISYEMP, t1.JOBCONTENT, t1.JSRQ, t1.LEGALORG, t41.LEVELCODE, t1.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t11.ORMORGSECTORID AS ORGSECTORID, t1.ORMORGID, t41.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME, t11.ORMORGSECTORID, t1.ORMSIGNORGID, t31.ORMSIGNORGNAME, t11.ORMORGID AS PERSONORGID, t61.ZZDZS AS PERSONORGNAME, t1.PIMCONTRACTID, t1.PIMCONTRACTNAME, t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID, t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.QSRQ, case when t1.HTLX='20' then t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME else t31.ORMSIGNORGNAME end AS SIGNINGUNIT, t1.SSLWPQGS, t1.SYDQSJ, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t11.YGBH, t11.YGZT, case when t11.YGZT in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS ZGCODE, t61.ZZDZS FROM T_PIMCONTRACT t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMLABOURCAMPANY t21 ON t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID = t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID LEFT JOIN T_ORMSIGNORG t31 ON t1.ORMSIGNORGID = t31.ORMSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_CONTRACTSIGNORG t51 ON t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID = t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t61 ON t11.ORMORGID = t61.ORGID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.HTLX = '20' AND ( t1.HTZT = '20' OR t1.HTZT = '30' ) )

SELECT t1.`ACTION`, t1.`CONTRACTNUM`, t1.`CONTRACTSIGNORGID`, t51.`CONTRACTSIGNORGNAME`, t1.`CONTRACTTYPE`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`CZ`, t11.`DBDWSJ`, t1.`DEMO`, ROUND(months_between(sysdate,t11.`DBDWSJ`)/12) AS `DURATION`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`|| ' '||t11.`YGBH` AS `EMPLOYEEANDNO`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`HTBH`, t1.`HTLX`, case when t1.`HTZT`='20' or t1.`HTZT`='30' then trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate) else null end AS `HTSYTS`, case when case when t1.`HTZT`='20' or t1.`HTZT`='30' then trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate) else null end<60 then 20 else 10 END AS `HTSYTS_COLOR`, t1.`HTZT`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `HTZZDZS`, t1.`ISFIRSTSIGN`, t1.`ISYEMP`, t1.`JOBCONTENT`, t1.`JSRQ`, t1.`LEGALORG`, t41.`LEVELCODE`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t41.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMSIGNORGID`, t31.`ORMSIGNORGNAME`, t11.`ORMORGID` AS `PERSONORGID`, t61.`ZZDZS` AS `PERSONORGNAME`, t1.`PIMCONTRACTID`, t1.`PIMCONTRACTNAME`, t1.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYID`, t21.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`QSRQ`, case when t1.`HTLX`='20' then t21.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME` else t31.`ORMSIGNORGNAME` end AS `SIGNINGUNIT`, t1.`SSLWPQGS`, t1.`SYDQSJ`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`YGBH`, t11.`YGZT`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t61.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_PIMCONTRACT` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMLABOURCAMPANY t21 ON t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID = t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID LEFT JOIN T_ORMSIGNORG t31 ON t1.ORMSIGNORGID = t31.ORMSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_CONTRACTSIGNORG t51 ON t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID = t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t61 ON t11.ORMORGID = t61.ORGID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( ( t11.`ORMORGID` = #{srf.webcontext.nodeid} OR t21.ORMORGID IN (select orgid from T_SRFORG where COMPANYFLAG= #{srf.webcontext.nodeid')}) OR EXISTS (select 1 from T_SRFORG where ORGCODE='BG' and orgid=#{srf.webcontext.nodeid')}) ) )

SELECT t1.ACTION, t1.CONTRACTNUM, t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID, t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGNAME, t1.CONTRACTTYPE, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.CZ, t11.DBDWSJ, t1.DEMO, ROUND(months_between(sysdate,t11.DBDWSJ)/12) AS DURATION, t11.PIMPERSONNAME|| ' '||t11.YGBH AS EMPLOYEEANDNO, t1.ENABLE, t1.HTBH, t1.HTLX, case when t1.HTZT='20' or t1.HTZT='30' then trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate) else null end AS HTSYTS, case when case when t1.HTZT='20' or t1.HTZT='30' then trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate) else null end<60 then 20 else 10 END AS HTSYTS_COLOR, t1.HTZT, t41.ZZDZS AS HTZZDZS, t1.ISFIRSTSIGN, t1.ISYEMP, t1.JOBCONTENT, t1.JSRQ, t1.LEGALORG, t41.LEVELCODE, t1.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t11.ORMORGSECTORID AS ORGSECTORID, t1.ORMORGID, t41.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME, t11.ORMORGSECTORID, t1.ORMSIGNORGID, t31.ORMSIGNORGNAME, t11.ORMORGID AS PERSONORGID, t61.ZZDZS AS PERSONORGNAME, t1.PIMCONTRACTID, t1.PIMCONTRACTNAME, t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID, t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.QSRQ, case when t1.HTLX='20' then t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME else t31.ORMSIGNORGNAME end AS SIGNINGUNIT, t1.SSLWPQGS, t1.SYDQSJ, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t11.YGBH, t11.YGZT, case when t11.YGZT in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS ZGCODE, t61.ZZDZS FROM T_PIMCONTRACT t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMLABOURCAMPANY t21 ON t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID = t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID LEFT JOIN T_ORMSIGNORG t31 ON t1.ORMSIGNORGID = t31.ORMSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_CONTRACTSIGNORG t51 ON t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID = t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t61 ON t11.ORMORGID = t61.ORGID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( ( t11.ORMORGID = #{srf.webcontext.nodeid} OR t21.ORMORGID IN (select orgid from T_SRFORG where COMPANYFLAG= #{srf.webcontext.nodeid')}) OR EXISTS (select 1 from T_SRFORG where ORGCODE='BG' and orgid=#{srf.webcontext.nodeid')}) ) )

SELECT t1.`ACTION`, t1.`CONTRACTNUM`, t1.`CONTRACTSIGNORGID`, t51.`CONTRACTSIGNORGNAME`, t1.`CONTRACTTYPE`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`CZ`, t11.`DBDWSJ`, t1.`DEMO`, ROUND(months_between(sysdate,t11.`DBDWSJ`)/12) AS `DURATION`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`|| ' '||t11.`YGBH` AS `EMPLOYEEANDNO`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`HTBH`, t1.`HTLX`, case when t1.`HTZT`='20' or t1.`HTZT`='30' then trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate) else null end AS `HTSYTS`, case when case when t1.`HTZT`='20' or t1.`HTZT`='30' then trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate) else null end<60 then 20 else 10 END AS `HTSYTS_COLOR`, t1.`HTZT`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `HTZZDZS`, t1.`ISFIRSTSIGN`, t1.`ISYEMP`, t1.`JOBCONTENT`, t1.`JSRQ`, t1.`LEGALORG`, t41.`LEVELCODE`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t41.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMSIGNORGID`, t31.`ORMSIGNORGNAME`, t11.`ORMORGID` AS `PERSONORGID`, t61.`ZZDZS` AS `PERSONORGNAME`, t1.`PIMCONTRACTID`, t1.`PIMCONTRACTNAME`, t1.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYID`, t21.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`QSRQ`, case when t1.`HTLX`='20' then t21.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME` else t31.`ORMSIGNORGNAME` end AS `SIGNINGUNIT`, t1.`SSLWPQGS`, t1.`SYDQSJ`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`YGBH`, t11.`YGZT`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t61.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_PIMCONTRACT` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMLABOURCAMPANY t21 ON t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID = t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID LEFT JOIN T_ORMSIGNORG t31 ON t1.ORMSIGNORGID = t31.ORMSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_CONTRACTSIGNORG t51 ON t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID = t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t61 ON t11.ORMORGID = t61.ORGID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`PIMPERSONID` = #{srf.datacontext.pimpersonid} )

SELECT t1.ACTION, t1.CONTRACTNUM, t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID, t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGNAME, t1.CONTRACTTYPE, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.CZ, t11.DBDWSJ, t1.DEMO, ROUND(months_between(sysdate,t11.DBDWSJ)/12) AS DURATION, t11.PIMPERSONNAME|| ' '||t11.YGBH AS EMPLOYEEANDNO, t1.ENABLE, t1.HTBH, t1.HTLX, case when t1.HTZT='20' or t1.HTZT='30' then trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate) else null end AS HTSYTS, case when case when t1.HTZT='20' or t1.HTZT='30' then trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate) else null end<60 then 20 else 10 END AS HTSYTS_COLOR, t1.HTZT, t41.ZZDZS AS HTZZDZS, t1.ISFIRSTSIGN, t1.ISYEMP, t1.JOBCONTENT, t1.JSRQ, t1.LEGALORG, t41.LEVELCODE, t1.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t11.ORMORGSECTORID AS ORGSECTORID, t1.ORMORGID, t41.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME, t11.ORMORGSECTORID, t1.ORMSIGNORGID, t31.ORMSIGNORGNAME, t11.ORMORGID AS PERSONORGID, t61.ZZDZS AS PERSONORGNAME, t1.PIMCONTRACTID, t1.PIMCONTRACTNAME, t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID, t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.QSRQ, case when t1.HTLX='20' then t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME else t31.ORMSIGNORGNAME end AS SIGNINGUNIT, t1.SSLWPQGS, t1.SYDQSJ, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t11.YGBH, t11.YGZT, case when t11.YGZT in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS ZGCODE, t61.ZZDZS FROM T_PIMCONTRACT t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMLABOURCAMPANY t21 ON t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID = t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID LEFT JOIN T_ORMSIGNORG t31 ON t1.ORMSIGNORGID = t31.ORMSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_CONTRACTSIGNORG t51 ON t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID = t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t61 ON t11.ORMORGID = t61.ORGID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.PIMPERSONID = #{srf.datacontext.pimpersonid} )

select * from v_signcontract t1 WHERE (( ((select orgcode from t_srforg b where b.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')}) not in ('BG','100','10101')) and instr(t1.levelcode, ( select a.levelcode from t_srforg a where a.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')}))=1) or ('ibzadmin' = (select t.loginaccountname from t_srfloginaccount t where t.loginaccountid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID')})) or (((select orgcode from t_srforg b where b.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')}) in ('BG','100','10101')) and t1.levelcode in ('01','0101')))

select t1.* from v_stopcontract t1 WHERE ((t1.levelcode in ('01','0101') and ((select orgcode from t_srforg b where b.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')}) in ('BG','100','10101'))) or (((select orgcode from t_srforg b where b.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')}) not in ('BG','100','10101')) and (instr(t1.levelcode, (select a.levelcode from t_srforg a where a.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')}))=1)) or 'ibzadmin' = (select t.loginaccountname from t_srfloginaccount t where t.loginaccountid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID')}))

SELECT t1.`ACTION`, t1.`CONTRACTNUM`, t1.`CONTRACTSIGNORGID`, t51.`CONTRACTSIGNORGNAME`, t1.`CONTRACTTYPE`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`CZ`, t11.`DBDWSJ`, t1.`DEMO`, ROUND(months_between(sysdate,t11.`DBDWSJ`)/12) AS `DURATION`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`|| ' '||t11.`YGBH` AS `EMPLOYEEANDNO`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`HTBH`, t1.`HTLX`, case when t1.`HTZT`='20' or t1.`HTZT`='30' then trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate) else null end AS `HTSYTS`, case when case when t1.`HTZT`='20' or t1.`HTZT`='30' then trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate) else null end<60 then 20 else 10 END AS `HTSYTS_COLOR`, t1.`HTZT`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `HTZZDZS`, t1.`ISFIRSTSIGN`, t1.`ISYEMP`, t1.`JOBCONTENT`, t1.`JSRQ`, t1.`LEGALORG`, t41.`LEVELCODE`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t41.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMSIGNORGID`, t31.`ORMSIGNORGNAME`, t11.`ORMORGID` AS `PERSONORGID`, t61.`ZZDZS` AS `PERSONORGNAME`, t1.`PIMCONTRACTID`, t1.`PIMCONTRACTNAME`, t1.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYID`, t21.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`QSRQ`, case when t1.`HTLX`='20' then t21.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME` else t31.`ORMSIGNORGNAME` end AS `SIGNINGUNIT`, t1.`SSLWPQGS`, t1.`SYDQSJ`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`YGBH`, t11.`YGZT`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t61.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_PIMCONTRACT` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMLABOURCAMPANY t21 ON t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID = t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID LEFT JOIN T_ORMSIGNORG t31 ON t1.ORMSIGNORGID = t31.ORMSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_CONTRACTSIGNORG t51 ON t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID = t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t61 ON t11.ORMORGID = t61.ORGID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`HTLX` = '30' )

SELECT t1.ACTION, t1.CONTRACTNUM, t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID, t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGNAME, t1.CONTRACTTYPE, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.CZ, t11.DBDWSJ, t1.DEMO, ROUND(months_between(sysdate,t11.DBDWSJ)/12) AS DURATION, t11.PIMPERSONNAME|| ' '||t11.YGBH AS EMPLOYEEANDNO, t1.ENABLE, t1.HTBH, t1.HTLX, case when t1.HTZT='20' or t1.HTZT='30' then trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate) else null end AS HTSYTS, case when case when t1.HTZT='20' or t1.HTZT='30' then trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate) else null end<60 then 20 else 10 END AS HTSYTS_COLOR, t1.HTZT, t41.ZZDZS AS HTZZDZS, t1.ISFIRSTSIGN, t1.ISYEMP, t1.JOBCONTENT, t1.JSRQ, t1.LEGALORG, t41.LEVELCODE, t1.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t11.ORMORGSECTORID AS ORGSECTORID, t1.ORMORGID, t41.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME, t11.ORMORGSECTORID, t1.ORMSIGNORGID, t31.ORMSIGNORGNAME, t11.ORMORGID AS PERSONORGID, t61.ZZDZS AS PERSONORGNAME, t1.PIMCONTRACTID, t1.PIMCONTRACTNAME, t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID, t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.QSRQ, case when t1.HTLX='20' then t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME else t31.ORMSIGNORGNAME end AS SIGNINGUNIT, t1.SSLWPQGS, t1.SYDQSJ, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t11.YGBH, t11.YGZT, case when t11.YGZT in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS ZGCODE, t61.ZZDZS FROM T_PIMCONTRACT t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMLABOURCAMPANY t21 ON t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID = t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID LEFT JOIN T_ORMSIGNORG t31 ON t1.ORMSIGNORGID = t31.ORMSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_CONTRACTSIGNORG t51 ON t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID = t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t61 ON t11.ORMORGID = t61.ORGID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.HTLX = '30' )

SELECT t1.`ACTION`, t1.`CONTRACTNUM`, t1.`CONTRACTSIGNORGID`, t51.`CONTRACTSIGNORGNAME`, t1.`CONTRACTTYPE`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`CZ`, t11.`DBDWSJ`, t1.`DEMO`, ROUND(months_between(sysdate,t11.`DBDWSJ`)/12) AS `DURATION`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`|| ' '||t11.`YGBH` AS `EMPLOYEEANDNO`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`HTBH`, t1.`HTLX`, case when t1.`HTZT`='20' or t1.`HTZT`='30' then trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate) else null end AS `HTSYTS`, case when case when t1.`HTZT`='20' or t1.`HTZT`='30' then trunc(t1.`JSRQ`)-trunc(sysdate) else null end<60 then 20 else 10 END AS `HTSYTS_COLOR`, t1.`HTZT`, t41.`ZZDZS` AS `HTZZDZS`, t1.`ISFIRSTSIGN`, t1.`ISYEMP`, t1.`JOBCONTENT`, t1.`JSRQ`, t1.`LEGALORG`, t41.`LEVELCODE`, t1.`ORMORGID` AS `ORGID`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID` AS `ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMORGID`, t41.`ORGNAME` AS `ORMORGNAME`, t11.`ORMORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORMSIGNORGID`, t31.`ORMSIGNORGNAME`, t11.`ORMORGID` AS `PERSONORGID`, t61.`ZZDZS` AS `PERSONORGNAME`, t1.`PIMCONTRACTID`, t1.`PIMCONTRACTNAME`, t1.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYID`, t21.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME`, t1.`PIMPERSONID`, t11.`PIMPERSONNAME`, t1.`QSRQ`, case when t1.`HTLX`='20' then t21.`PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME` else t31.`ORMSIGNORGNAME` end AS `SIGNINGUNIT`, t1.`SSLWPQGS`, t1.`SYDQSJ`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t11.`YGBH`, t11.`YGZT`, case when t11.`YGZT` in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS `ZGCODE`, t61.`ZZDZS` FROM `T_PIMCONTRACT` t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMLABOURCAMPANY t21 ON t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID = t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID LEFT JOIN T_ORMSIGNORG t31 ON t1.ORMSIGNORGID = t31.ORMSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_CONTRACTSIGNORG t51 ON t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID = t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t61 ON t11.ORMORGID = t61.ORGID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`PIMPERSONID` = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID} )

SELECT t1.ACTION, t1.CONTRACTNUM, t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID, t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGNAME, t1.CONTRACTTYPE, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.CZ, t11.DBDWSJ, t1.DEMO, ROUND(months_between(sysdate,t11.DBDWSJ)/12) AS DURATION, t11.PIMPERSONNAME|| ' '||t11.YGBH AS EMPLOYEEANDNO, t1.ENABLE, t1.HTBH, t1.HTLX, case when t1.HTZT='20' or t1.HTZT='30' then trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate) else null end AS HTSYTS, case when case when t1.HTZT='20' or t1.HTZT='30' then trunc(t1.JSRQ)-trunc(sysdate) else null end<60 then 20 else 10 END AS HTSYTS_COLOR, t1.HTZT, t41.ZZDZS AS HTZZDZS, t1.ISFIRSTSIGN, t1.ISYEMP, t1.JOBCONTENT, t1.JSRQ, t1.LEGALORG, t41.LEVELCODE, t1.ORMORGID AS ORGID, t11.ORMORGSECTORID AS ORGSECTORID, t1.ORMORGID, t41.ORGNAME AS ORMORGNAME, t11.ORMORGSECTORID, t1.ORMSIGNORGID, t31.ORMSIGNORGNAME, t11.ORMORGID AS PERSONORGID, t61.ZZDZS AS PERSONORGNAME, t1.PIMCONTRACTID, t1.PIMCONTRACTNAME, t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID, t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME, t1.PIMPERSONID, t11.PIMPERSONNAME, t1.QSRQ, case when t1.HTLX='20' then t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYNAME else t31.ORMSIGNORGNAME end AS SIGNINGUNIT, t1.SSLWPQGS, t1.SYDQSJ, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t11.YGBH, t11.YGZT, case when t11.YGZT in ('40','50','60','130','51') then '20' else '10' end AS ZGCODE, t61.ZZDZS FROM T_PIMCONTRACT t1 LEFT JOIN T_PIMPERSON t11 ON t1.PIMPERSONID = t11.PIMPERSONID LEFT JOIN T_PIMLABOURCAMPANY t21 ON t1.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID = t21.PIMLABOURCAMPANYID LEFT JOIN T_ORMSIGNORG t31 ON t1.ORMSIGNORGID = t31.ORMSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t41 ON t1.ORMORGID = t41.ORGID LEFT JOIN T_CONTRACTSIGNORG t51 ON t1.CONTRACTSIGNORGID = t51.CONTRACTSIGNORGID LEFT JOIN T_SRFORG t61 ON t11.ORMORGID = t61.ORGID WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.PIMPERSONID = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID} )
